title: Search for security
creator_credit: Zanthus Films, Victoria. Hospitals and Charities Commission, Jennie Blackwood and Adrian Boddington
brief_description: A presentation of the problems facing the aged and the community’s responsibility to them. Shows through the experiences of one elderly lady (played by Lorna Forbes) the services rendered by social workers, district nurses, and “meals on wheels”. Emphasises need for companionship, warmth and comfort, as well as a degree of independence.
